item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Henry Ward Beecher
item.description: "Once an ill can be patiently born it is robbed of its poison if not its pain." -- Henry Ward Beecher

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi
item.description: "the self expands through acts of self forgetfulness." -- Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Necessity is the mother of taking chances." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Pascal
item.description: "To understand is to forgive." -- Pascal

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Erich Fromm
item.description: "Greedhas no satiation point, since its consummation does not fill the inner emptiness, boredom, loneliness, and depression it is meant to overcome." -- Erich Fromm

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Marie Osmond
item.description: "If you’re going to be able to look back on something and laugh about it, you might as well laugh about it now." -- Marie Osmond

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Martina Navratilova
item.description: "The moment of victory is much too short to live for that and nothing else." -- Martina Navratilova

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Francis Bacon
item.description: "The worst solitute is to be destitute of true friendship." -- Francis Bacon

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Be strong, be courageous, do not be afraid for I am with you always. I will never leave you nor forsake you." -- Anonymous

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "If one cannot enjoy reading a book over and over again, there is no use in reading it at all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The difference between genius and stupidity is; genius has its limits." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Linda Grayson
item.description: "There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate." -- Linda Grayson

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "If you treat an individual as he is, he will remain how he is. But if you treat him as if he were what he ought to be and could be, he will become what he ought to be and could be." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
